description: Try our easy to follow Nonna's Ricotta Zeppole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mini doughnut,Pescatarian,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Easter,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Nonna's Ricotta Zeppole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift plain flour and baking powder into a bowl. Whisk eggs, caster sugar, grated lemon or orange rind and vanilla extract together in a bowl until combined. Add ricotta and whisk in lightly until just combined.

Heat vegetable oil in a medium saucepan over medium high heat. Drop heaped teaspoonfuls of mixture into oil and fry for about 2 minutes until golden and crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel. Dust with icing sugar and serve. Note: Vanilla extract is different to vanilla essence.
